Arkansas River at Canon City, CO
Arkansas River Basin
Annual (Water Year, Oct-Sep) streamflow reconstruction
Values in acre-feet
Recon = reconstruction
Observed = undepleted flow record from AMEC Earth and Environmental, Boulder, CO
Recon Interval: 1685-1987		
Observed Interval: 1889-1894; 1896-1987		
PI: C. Woodhouse
Reference: n/a		
URL: n/a
